kjv: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son.
nsrv_ce: For God so loved the world that he gave his only Son.

kjv: He who helps thy weary shall under His presence, find rest everlasting.
nsrv_ce: Whoever aids the weary shall dwell in the shelter of His presence forever.

kjv: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
nsrv_ce: The Lord is my shepherd, I shall not want.

kjv: Let thy hands be diligent, and thy heart pure, for in such the Lord delights.
nsrv_ce: Let your hands be diligent and your heart pure, for in these the Lord takes pleasure.

kjv: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.
nsrv_ce: The heavens are telling the glory of God; and the firmament proclaims his handiwork.

kjv: Blessed are they who walk in silence, for their steps are guided by the whisper of the Lord.
nsrv_ce: Blessed are those who walk in stillness, for the Lord's whisper shall guide them.

kjv: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
nsrv_ce: I can do all things through him who strengthens me.

kjv: He shall lift thee from the dust and crown thee with gladness.
nsrv_ce: He will raise you from the dust and place on you a crown of joy.
